name: Roy's Hamburger (Spanish) BARELY FINISHED & BAD.
description: Yo, if you found  this game. DO NOT PLAY IT. Please, don't play it. This game is in Spanish, and it was just a prototype of making a game with start and finish. It is like a minute long, I barely put any true effort and, as you may have expect, the game is TRASH. I just want it here as a ''backup'', so I don't permanently lose my RPG maker finished projects. So... Just skip this one, or play it for 90 hours. I don't give a flip, honestly. It is open source, so change it, or do a full-blown remake or whatever, I don't care. This game should burn in hell, my creation should burn in hell. Let's laugh at this stupid game.
